Subject: US v. Maxwell - Government Letter Due Today 
Date: Mon, 07 Jun 2021 21:19:58 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-06-07_GM_Ietter update_re_MDC_conditions_final.pdf 
Counsel, 
Our update letter to the Court regarding MDC conditions is due today. Can you please let us know by 8:30 pm if you 
intend to seek any redactions to the attached letter? If so, we will plan to send the letter by email to the Court to give you 
an opportunity to propose and justify any redactions. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel 
EFTA00025218
